This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS setRootScroller API enabled 
PASS Setter and getter on a valid element works 
PASS Can set a non-scrolling element as the rootScroller 
PASS Scrolls don't chain past root scroller element 
PASS document.scrollingElement and window scroll API reflect rootScroller offsets 
PASS Setting an invalid rootScroller should reset to using the documentElement. 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
